txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Pure black fur from the beasts and worms surrounding the encampment at Pynti-peldot. Deliver the items to Lauri, one of the Lossoth-scouts at the encampment in Forochel.
'This will help our people much. Thank you.'
'Our hunting and supplies have suffered since the arrival of the wind from the east. We run low on furs and skin from the beasts in the wilds.'
The Lossoth-scout Lauri at Pynti-peldot awaits the delivery of pure black fur.
Deliver the pure black fur to Lauri at Pynti-peldot in Forochel
You have accepted a task to collect and deliver pure black fur from the beasts and worms surrounding the encampment of Pynti-peldot to Lauri, a Lossoth-scout.
Wanted: Pure black fur from the beasts and worms surrounding the encampment at Pynti-peldot.
